It was jointly established by Nankai University, Oxford University and Shenzhen Futian District Government. This is the first overseas research institute that Oxford University jointly established in China with the university from the mainland China, Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.The Nankai-Oxford Joint Research Institute will be leBirmingham-Nankai Joint Research InstituteOn January 15, 2018, Nankai University and the University of Birmingham signed the Cooperation Agreement of the Joint Research Institute on Green Economy and Sustainable Development between the two universities. Birmingham-Nankai Joint Research Institute is a new starting point and new opportunity to deepen strategic cooperation in scientific research based on more than 20 years of cooperation between the two universities.
